text: "Summertime Blues" is a 1958 song written by singer Eddie Cochran and went to number 8 in the United States and number 18 in the United Kingdom. It was covered by The Who in 1970. == References == Category:1958 songs Category:Eddie Cochran songs Category:The Who songs Category:The Beach Boys songs Category:Rush (band) songs Category:Alan Jackson songs Category:Van Halen songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs Category:Olivia Newton-John songs Category:The Rolling Stones songs Category:Jimi Hendrix songs Category:Joan Jett and The Blackhearts songs Category:Johnny Hallyday songs Category:T. Rex (band) songs Category:Deborah Harry songs
title: Summertime Blues
